| Amit Duvdevani Erez Eisen
}} 'Infected Mushroom' is an Israeli psytrance/electronica duo formed in Haifa
in 1998 by producers Erez Eisen and Amit Duvdevani.
Both founding members currently reside in Los Angeles, California.

They employ a variety of musical sources, including acoustic guitars and complex
synthesized basses, in compositions that often contain changes of drum beat and
tempo. Infected Mushroom's live shows feature vocals and analogue instruments in
performances that are set against a multimedia backdrop.

Infected Mushroom is one of the best-selling groups in Israel's history, in
terms of both domestic and international sales. Their videos have tens of
millons of views on Youtube as of 2013. Billboard8 Mar 2008, Vol. 120, No.
10, Published by Nielsen Business Media, Inc, p 52
